Description:
Create an easy-to-understand code for the server-side web applications.
Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules.
Facilitate the technical team in the PHP development process by providing inputs at each stage.
Assess the feasibility and functioning of the product through appropriate measures that include troubleshooting and testing.
Examine the client requirements for adding the required features to the existing software or application.
Identify and solve errors in the code that cause issues in the smooth functioning of the developed application.Skills
Skills:
A proficient PHP developer well-versed in handling a variety of projects based on the popular scripting language PHP.
Proficient in utilizing all the latest trends, tools, and techniques related to web building processes and cycles.
Proficient in using third-party application programming interfaces offered by renowned companies like Facebook, Google, or Twitter.
Adept at working with new PHP-based technologies to create a seamless online web application.
Exhibiting a phenomenal grasp of OOP concepts and the practical utility to develop simple and ergonomic digital applications.
Relevant graduate-level education in Computer Science or IT.
